parts.text: {"word":"ensuciarse","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(再帰動詞)汚れる、汚す","english_definition":"to get dirty; to become soiled","examples":[{"sentence":"No te sientes ahí, te vas a ensuciar.","translation":"そこに座らないで、汚れるよ。"},{"sentence":"Se ensució la camisa con salsa.","translation":"彼はシャツをソースで汚した。"}],"collocations":["ensuciarse las manos (手を汚す)","ensuciarse la ropa (服を汚す)"],"synonyms":["mancharse","empolvarse","macularse"],"antonyms":["limpiarse","asearse"]}],"etymology":{"value":"'En-' (接頭辞、～にする) + 'sucio' (汚い) + '-arse' (再帰代名詞)","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ensuˈθjarse/ (スペイン) or /ensuˈsjarse/ (ラテンアメリカ)","syllables":"en-su-ciar-se"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["me ensucio","te ensucias","se ensucia","nos ensuciamos","os ensuciáis","se ensucian"],"past_simple":"me ensucié","te ensuciaste","se ensució","nos ensuciamos","os ensuciasteis","se ensuciaron"],"future_simple":["me ensuciaré","te ensuciarás","se ensuciará","nos ensuciaremos","os ensuciaréis","se ensuciarán"],"conditional_simple":["me ensuciaría","te ensuciarías","se ensuciaría","nos ensuciaríamos","os ensuciaríais","se ensuciarían"],"present_subjunctive":["me ensucie","te ensucies","se ensucie","nos ensuciemos","os ensuciéis","se ensucien"],"past_subjunctive":["me ensuciara/se","te ensuciaras/ses","se ensuciara/se","nos ensuciáramos/semos","os ensuciarais/seis","se ensuciaran/sen"],"imperative":["ensúciate (tú)","ensúciese (usted)","ensuciémonos (nosotros)","ensuciaos (vosotros)","ensúciense (ustedes)"]}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Ensuciarse' は再帰動詞であり、主語自身が汚れることを意味します。 他のものを汚す場合は、再帰代名詞なしで 'ensuciar' を使用します。","priority":"N/A"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Yo ensucio.","correct":"Yo me ensucio.","note":"自分自身が汚れる場合は再帰代名詞が必要です。"}],"priority":"N/A"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["sucio (汚い)","suciedad (汚れ)","ensuciar (汚す)"],"priority":"N/A"},"level_frequency":{"level":"N/A","frequency_google_ngram":"N/A","priority":"N/A"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"N/A","text":"再帰動詞であるため、活用に注意が必要です。自分自身が汚れることを表す場合に用います。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Ten cuidado de no ensuciarte con el barro.","translation":"泥で汚れないように気をつけて。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"汚れる"},{"sentence":"No quiero ensuciarme el vestido nuevo.","translation":"新しいドレスを汚したくない。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"汚れる"}]}
